content: Customer John Smith has been our most loyal customer since June 2023. He consistently orders pepperoni and BBQ chicken pizzas, usually twice a week. Always tips well and leaves positive reviews. He mentioned he's lactose intolerant but takes pills to enjoy our pizzas - that's dedication! His favorite customization is extra cheese on pepperoni.
summary: John Smith - VIP customer profile and preferences

content: Hawaiian pizza controversy analysis: Our data shows that Hawaiian pizza, despite being our most controversial item, has a dedicated following. 30% of reviews mention the controversy, but those who order it have a 75% reorder rate. David Kim orders it exclusively and has introduced 3 friends to it. Consider marketing campaign: 'Pick a Side - Hawaiian Pizza Week'
summary: Hawaiian pizza controversy drives engagement and loyalty

content: Vegetarian customer segment growing: Maria Garcia leads our vegetarian customer segment. Her reviews have influenced at least 5 other customers to try our vegetarian options. She specifically praised the Margherita for authenticity but noted the Veggie Supreme needs improvement (soggy vegetables). Consider pre-roasting vegetables as she suggested.
summary: Maria Garcia influences vegetarian segment growth

content: Supply chain insight: Our mozzarella supplier 'Italian Dairy Co' has been consistent for 2 years. However, they mentioned potential price increases next quarter due to milk shortages. We should consider negotiating a long-term contract now or identifying alternative suppliers. Current cost is $0.02/gram with 14-day shelf life.
summary: Mozzarella supply chain risk - price increase warning

content: Peak ordering pattern discovered: Analysis shows our busiest time is Friday 6-8 PM, with 40% of weekly orders. Pepperoni and BBQ Chicken are most popular during this window. We've had 3 instances of running out of pepperoni during Friday rush. Recommendation: Increase pepperoni prep by 50% on Fridays and add extra staff 5-9 PM.
summary: Friday evening rush pattern requires operational adjustments

content: BBQ Chicken sauce recipe evolution: Chef updated BBQ sauce recipe in October, adding honey and smoked paprika. Customer feedback improved 15% after change. Recipe: 60% BBQ base, 20% honey, 10% apple cider vinegar, 5% smoked paprika, 5% secret spices. This is now our proprietary blend - 'Smoky Sweet BBQ'.
summary: Proprietary BBQ sauce recipe improved customer satisfaction
